title: MST Access up and running with Salt Lake
text:
There's a new pay-for-coverage research provider in the market.

Street Talk understands boutique equities research firm, MST has a new platform called "MST Access" which uses elements of the ASX research scheme to enable coverage of little-known microcaps.

MST Access analysts will cover a microcap in return for a fee from the company – and plug a gap in sell-side research left by the global and national stockbroking firms scaling back equities research functions.

An MST Access report for Perth-based Salt Lake Potash (market cap: $215 million) landed on Street Talk's desk this week. The report, dated October 11, clearly states that it was commissioned by Salt Lake Potash and prepared by MST Access analysts, in return for a fee.

MST Access analysts put a $1.25 a share net present value on the company on a fully diluted basis, or $1.58 on an undiluted basis. The stock was trading at 79¢ prior to the report landing and finished the day at 84¢.
description: There's a new pay-for-coverage research provider in the market.
